Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Bunsen
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A basic light tank, the Bunsen is a modified armoured vehicle suited for taking on enemy fortifications and exposed infantry. Special light plating to prevent self-immolation, combined with its main weapon drawing directly from its enlarged fuel tanks, leave it a very precarious model to field.

Similar to other tier 1 vehicles, this is a gas guzzler and best used for medium distances, however itâ€™s also less fuel efficient on the world map.
